root.name: Resistance: Burning Skies
root.description: This game was released on May 29th, 2012. Unlike Resistance: Retribution, Resistance: Burning Skies is a First-Person Shooter. The player can pick up weapons in the game by placing their hand below the camera of the PlayStation Vita, as if they were picking up an actual weapon in real life.

similar_games.game: Call of Duty: Black Ops Declassified
